kuda the karmanthashala saha wi mol himiyan gewagatha nohaki naya barakin miriki siti nisa eewa swabhawikawama wasi yana thaththwayata pathwa thibuna.1985 sita pawathi rajayan wisin anugamanaya kala paudgalikarana wadapiliwela nisa wawili karmanthaya, lihisi thel, gas, wane, simenthi, tayar, pingan, telikom, rakshana, guwan sewa athulu rajya aayathana ha wathkam wikuna thibuna. kalak itha samruddhimathwa pawathi redipili karmanthashala wasa dama sini karmanthaya adapana kirimata katayuthu kara thibunu nisa ema bhanda aanayanaya kirimata sidu wuna.janathakaranaye namayen gamana gamana mandalaya samagam rashiyakata wenkara adapana kara thibuna.

ohoma kale yaddi sarath ayiya pawula pitin lankawata yanawa naththal niwaduwakata, lankawedi sarath ayiyage loku putha awurudu 8yi , asanipa wenawa kotinma unak ganenawa, sathiyak withara yanawa una bahinne na passe meyala nawaloka spirithale nawaththanawa,lankawe me kale dengu rogayath hamathanama ne muladi meyalath ehema hithanawa, rudhira parikashana rashiyak kalath dokala eka eka dewal kiyanawa, mokadda lede kiyala kiyanne na, sarath ayiya adunana dosthara kenek sarath ayiyata kiyanne lamayawath aragena ikmaninma sarath ayiyala inna ratata yanna kiyala,nawaloke dosthara kenek sarath ayiyata kiyanawa podi ekata liyukemiya thathwayak wage thiyenne kiyala, sarath ayiyage oluwa gini ganne eeka ahapuwama,sarath ayiya kiyanne lankawe sahena tharamakata igena gaththu kenek eya me roga ganath yam pamanakata dannawa, nawaloken poddak lamayawa dena eka parakku karanawa kohomath lankawe godak pudgalika rohalwala hatiyak ne eeka,sarath ayiya mokada karanne ikmanin eya tikat eka edama dagena,eya hithawath lankawe ihala hamuda niladhariyek lawwa lamayawa spirithalen eliyata aragena guwan thotupalin pitawenawa lamaya rogi thathwayen iddima, yam rogi thathwayak thiyanawa nam guwan yana wala magiyekwa ganne na ne, kohomahari sarath ayiyalata karadarayak wenawa wenath guwan yanawakata maru wimidi lamayage rogi thathwaya dakina ee guwan thotupale aya meyalawa thiya gannawa,ethanin ee rate rohalakata danawa ,ee rohale sathiyak withara yaddi kiyanawa me lamayata liyukemiya rogaya thiyenne kiyala, passe sarath ayiyala inna rate eyalage jiwitha rakshana nisa ee raten rogin geniyana ambiyulans jet yanayak yodagena sarath ayiyala padinchi ratata enawa kelinma yanne rohalatamayi lamayawa aragena dan ithin rogaya sthirayi liyukemiyawa kiyala, sarath ayiya hadunana lankikayo lamaya wenuwen noyek noyek aagamika wathawath karanawa ,upades denawa araka meka, oya atharadi samahara lankikayo puduma kathawak pracharaya karanawa sarath ayiyage lamayata arawage rogayak aawe sarath ayiya prasiddhiye karapu waraddat ,thamange birida iddi wenin ganiyek ekka thibba sambandayata, eyata paw sama kara ganna kiyanawa eya aththatama manasikawa unath godak watenawa me nisama eya aththatama ara aniyam sambandhaya ath arinawa.

ethan sita ihalata thani kelin nangi sitina nuwaragala gal parwathayehi bawumata wennata thanin thana galin sadu mura kuti kihipayak hamu we.dethun denekuta sitiya haki se manawa gal sitawa sakas kara athi mura kuti atharin kanda mudunata nangimata wakrakarawa man pethak wati atha.
mewwa gana kathakarath jathi___ lebal wadina bawa gaththa dannawa.
mama gaththa eewage "sawi" satahan karala thiyenawa.
me ghathanaya siduwimen pasu boho kalayak yana thuru ee isawwata kanthawaka thiya pirimiyeku ho thanipangalame giye natha.
dala jathika nishpadithayehi wardhanaya, wideshiya sancharaka sankhyawa aadi sankhyanawalin nithora nithora apata dama gasanne da sanwardhanaya yi.
ul thudu walin hil harenakota ee kisima thaneka mal pipen naha, galwenawa witharayi.
me siyalu karana thula owunge aarthika samajiya jana jiwithaya antha pirihimakata pathwiya.
aarakshaka hamudawala jiwitha awadanama pahawa giyeya.
rate abhyanthara katayuthu walata angili gasana wideshiya kumanthrana athayi lankawen nithara ahannata labe.
pan pilissima wasara dahathara dahasak dakwa aatha athithayakata diwayana bawa purawidya kanimakadi anawaranaya wela thiyenawa.

perasiti adhirajaya wisin nindagam lesa di thibu wishala bhumi pudesha praweni bhukthiyata laba nodima nisa 1673 saha 1681athara kalayedakunu china senpathin thidenaku wisin meheyawu karalla kanshi adhirajaya wisin mardanaya karana ladi. 1662di dakunu min rajawanshaya bindawatimen pasu min rajapakshikayaku wu koshinga (shen chengon) wisin meheyawana lada karalikara tungnin rajadhaniya parajaya kirimen pasu 1683di kwin rajyaya dakunu thayiwanaye ubhaya palanayak gegiye ya.

chanda madhyasthana 566 kadi chandaya prakasha karana athara manthriwarun 18 denaku path kara gane.chanda petti prawahanaya kirima eeye (07) udasana sita paswaruwa wana thek sidu wiya.mathiwarana rajakari niladharin saha polis aarakshawa sahithawa mema katayuthu sidu kala bawa pradeshiya warthakaruwo pawasuha.mathiwarana rajakari sandaha polisiya polis niladharin 21000 k yodawa athi bawath, polis wishesha karya balakaya da hadisi awasthawan sandaha ee ee pradeshawala sthana gatha kara athi bawa polis prakashaka jyeshta polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha pawasiya.jangama mura sewa saha siwil andumen sarasunu pudgalayan da, wishesha aarakshaka wadapiliwelak da chandaya pawathwena pradeshawalata yodawa athayi ajith rohana mahatha pawasiya.mathiwaranaya nirikshanayata mewarath pafaral sanwidhanaya wisin pulul wadapiliwelak yoda athi bawath, palath thune siyalu chanda madhyasthana aawaranaya wana paridi eya kriyathmaka karana bawath, pafaral sanwidhanaye widhayaka adhyaksha rohana hettiaarachchi mahatha pawasiya.mewara mathiwarana prachanda kriya adu wi athi bawa polis mathiwarana nirikshana karyanshaya pawasayi.
